column4: Are there any ATI Radeon 9250 drivers for ubuntu other than the official ATI drivers? They're not compatible with my card
Are there any ATI Radeon 9250 drivers for Ubuntu 8.10? The official ATI drivers aren't compatible with this OS
Can anyone else vouch for this "Envyng"?
envyng is good..  it even works for ati drivers in many cases these days
sudo apt-get install envyng-core, move to terminal and type envyng -t
that is literally all you do
it will ask what drivers you want, and you tell it.  (ATI or nVidia)
and once that is done, type envyng -t
you shouldn't need to mount it
just double click the iso file, and it should prompt you for what you want to do with it
one of those options are burn to CD/DVD
if it says "burn image to CD/DVD", then if the .iso is of a bootable CD, then it will be bootable
just do it through the write to disk menu
